title: Short-Term Intensive Entrepreneurship (EM) Development Program for Engineering Students

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational engineering and mathematical concepts, mobile device usage experience
context.additional_context: Modular learning design based on the KEEN 3Cs (Curiosity, Connections, Creating Value) framework, structuring learning activities implementable in smartphone-centric constrained technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply the ideation process for engineering problem-solving with over 80% accuracy
Learners can present at least 3 strategies for connecting engineering solutions to social value through the Creating Value framework
Learners can discover at least 2 integrative connections (Connections) between engineering projects using the KEEN 3Cs framework

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
